steps.desc1:
Mafia is a party game with modeling a conflict between two groups: an informed minority ( Tho Mafia ), and an uninformed majority ( The Citizens ). At the start of the game, each player is secretly assigned a role affiliated with one of these teams. The game has two alternating phases:
Night, during which the mafia may covertly 'murder' a citizen, and Day, in which surviving players debate the identities of the mafia and vote to eliminate a suspect. The game continues until all the mafia players have been eliminated or the mafia outnumber the citizens.

Mafia is a popular and interesting party game, but always it is hard to control and manage the game by the game moderator ( God ) when you want to play it with a large group of people.
MafiaBuzz is a web application created by a team of developers and gamers. With the help of the application, you just have to select players and characters to start the game. Write the name of each person and give the phone to them to see their roles. After that God can start the game and app will tell him what to do, calculate possibilities and show the result.
MafiaBuzz team will add new characters to the game in a small period of time.

Game is played by two teams: Tho Mafia and The Citizens ( There is a team named Solo and it is part of citizen's team but they can win the game seperately from citizens with their abilities ). Live games require a moderator ( God ) who does not participate as a player, and identities are assigned by application. At the start of the game, every mafioso is given the identities of their teammates, whereas citizens only receive the number of mafioso in the game, and do not know which players are mafia and which are citizens.
There are two phases: Night and Day. At Night, certain players secretly perform special actions; during Day, players discuss and vote to kill one player. These phases alternate with each other until all mafioso have been eliminated or until the mafia outnumbers the citizens.
Some players may be given roles with special abilities (Chosen by Game Creator)

Night: All players close their eyes. The moderator then instructs all members of The Mafia to open their eyes and acknowledge their accomplices. Similar process for waking up pepole occurs by moderator for other roles with nightly actions.

Day: The moderator instructs players to open their eyes and announces what happened the previous night. Discussion ensues among the living players. At any point, a player may accuse someone of being a mafioso and prompt others to vote to kill them. If over half of the players do so, the accused person is eliminated and Night begins. Otherwise, thos phase continues until a killing occurs. Dead players are not permitted to attempt to influence the remainder of the game. Because players have more freedom to deliberate, Days tend to be longer than Nights.
Different characters and roles are making MafiaBuzz much funnier and more enjoyable. In below we are explaining about each character seperately:
